      Methods in com.idibon.api.model that return Label 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Label LabelBuilder.commit()
      Saves all changes represented by this LabelBuilder to the API, and returns the resulting Label.

      Create a label instance for a label with the provided name in the current task.
      Methods in com.idibon.api.model that return types with arguments of type Label 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<? extends Label> Task.getLabels()
      Returns all of the labels within this task.
      Map<Label,Double> DocumentPrediction.getPredictedConfidences()
      Returns the predicted confidences for the requested DocumentContent against all Labels in the Task.
      Map<Label,List<? extends TuningRules.Rule>> Task.getRules()
      Returns all of the ML tuning rules defined for this task.
      Map<Label,List<String>> DocumentPrediction.getSignificantFeatures()
      Returns the document features (word, n-grams, etc.) from the document that were most significant for each label.
      Map<Label,Set<? extends Task>> Task.getSubtasks()
      Returns the list of sub-tasks that are triggered by predictions for each Label in this task.
      Methods in com.idibon.api.model with parameters of type Label 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Task.addSubtaskTriggers(Label trigger, Task... tasks)
      Configures a subtask trigger: when a document is classified as the provided Label, the document should also be classified against the triggered Task.
